name: Asteroids Retro Clone
description:
Hello everyone!

This game was build to be showcase in a bigger project. I had a lot of fun remaking a clone of the original game. Endless swarms of asteroids and aliens. This is a student project.

Quick shout out to TwistdRabbit for help with art.

Controls are 

WASD - Movement

Space - Shooting

You get three lives if you die you can quit or play again.
